title: Define Architectural Design
description: Develop the overall architecture for the PureFunctionalGameEngine based on the principles of functional programming and immutable state.

title: Implement Core Functional Game Logic
description: Design and implement core game logic using pure functions and immutable state.

title: Design Game Rendering using Functional Approach
description: Design a functional approach for game rendering to ensure performance and maintainability.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create comprehensive and accessible technical documentation detailing the implementation and usage of the PureFunctionalGameEngine. The document should include key concepts, examples, and best practices for using the engine. Ensure the documentation is organized in a logical and user-friendly manner.
dependencies: Design Game Rendering using Functional Approach

title: Review Technical Documentation Draft
description: Review the draft of the technical documentation and provide feedback for improvement.
